en.title: What Is a Cat Virus Test? Basics of FIV and FeLV
en.content:
A cat virus test checks for infection with Feline Immunodeficiency Virus (FIV, commonly known as "cat AIDS") and Feline Leukemia Virus (FeLV). It is especially important when welcoming a new cat into your home.

What Is FIV (Feline Immunodeficiency Virus)?

FIV is a virus that weakens a cat's immune system. It is primarily transmitted through bite wounds from other cats. Even after infection, there is often a long asymptomatic period, and with proper care, many cats can live just as long as uninfected ones. It can be prevented by keeping cats indoors and avoiding contact with other cats.

What Is FeLV (Feline Leukemia Virus)?

FeLV is transmitted through saliva and nasal discharge and affects the immune system and blood cell production. It tends to have more serious consequences than FIV, but it can be prevented through vaccination.

When to Get Tested

Testing is recommended before welcoming a new cat and before starting a multi-cat household. Reputable breeders conduct virus testing before handing over kittens.

Fuluck Cattery's Approach

At Fuluck Cattery, we perform virus tests on all kittens before handover and share the results with our clients. We are committed to thorough health management so you can welcome your new kitten with complete peace of mind.

zh.title: 什么是猫咪病毒检测？FIV与FeLV的基础知识
zh.content:
猫咪病毒检测是确认猫免疫缺陷病毒（FIV，俗称"猫艾滋"）和猫白血病病毒（FeLV）感染情况的检查。在迎接新猫咪时尤为重要。

什么是FIV（猫免疫缺陷病毒）

FIV是一种会降低猫咪免疫力的病毒，主要通过猫与猫之间的咬伤传播。即使感染后也有较长的无症状期，通过适当的护理，很多猫咪可以像正常猫一样长寿。通过完全室内饲养、避免与其他猫接触可以有效预防。

什么是FeLV（猫白血病病毒）

FeLV通过唾液和鼻涕传播，会影响免疫系统和造血功能。相比FIV，更容易产生严重影响，但可以通过疫苗预防。

检测的时机

建议在迎接新猫之前以及开始多猫饲养之前进行检测。值得信赖的繁育者会在交付前进行病毒检测。

福楽猫舍的做法

福楽猫舍会在交付前对所有幼猫进行病毒检测，并将结果告知客户。我们彻底做好健康管理，让您安心迎接新的家庭成员。
